s: The Amazon is a yoyo that is crafted from materials found in the Underground Jungle biome. It has a spin duration of 8-9 seconds and can reach up to 13 tiles. Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.

March 10, 2025 - The Amazon is a pre-hardmode yoyo that can be crafted at an Iron Anvil. The Amazon has a jungle theme and is thus crafted with jungle related ingredients. It is the 4th tier of yoyo after the Malaise and Artery. The Amazons best modifier is godly, as it cannot increase in size.
